question: Which river divides the city of Toruń, Poland into two parts?
asked_question_translated: Quelle rivière divise la ville de Toruń, en Pologne, en deux parties ?
answer: La ville de Toruń, en Pologne, est divisée en deux parties par la rivière Vistule.
answer_translated_eng: The city of Toruń, in Poland, is divided into two parts by the Vistula river.
